original: @227b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @227b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /
translated: Uṣṇīṣavijayāsādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: uṣṇīṣavijayā sādhana

original: 'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Uṣṇīṣavijayā.

original: bsam gtan ma chags 'gro la mnyes //
analyzed: bsam gtan ma chags 'gro la mnyes //
translated: Delighting in going to the unattached meditative concentration,

original: 'gro mgon padma la btud nas ;
analyzed: 'gro mgon padma la btud nas ;
translated: bowing to the lotus-born protector of beings,

original: / rang nyid sgrub thabs dran bya'i phyir //
analyzed: / rang nyid sgrub thabs dran bya'i phyir //
translated: in order to recollect the sādhana for oneself,

original: rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs bshad //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs bshad //
translated: I will explain the sādhana of Vijayā.

original: sa 'dzin la sogs yid 'ong ba'i //
analyzed: sa 'dzin la sogs yid 'ong ba'i //
translated: In a delightful place such as a mountain,

original: phyogs 'ga' zhig tu gnas nas ni //
analyzed: phyogs 'ga' zhig tu gnas nas ni //
translated: having settled in one place,

original: shin tu 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug / rnal 'byor bsam bya bsam par bya //
analyzed: shin tu 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug / rnal 'byor bsam bya bsam par bya //
translated: sitting on a very soft seat, the yogin should contemplate the thought to be contemplated.

original: sems can rnams kyi bde 'byung ba //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bde 'byung ba //
translated: The source of happiness for sentient beings,

original: de la bhr'um bcas 'od zer 'phros //
analyzed: de la bhr'um bcas 'od zer 'phros //
translated: from that, light rays radiate with bhrūṃ,

original: sangs rgyas rnams ni gsal byas nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams ni gsal byas nas //
translated: illuminating the buddhas,

original: dus gsum gshegs rnams mchod par bya //
analyzed: dus gsum gshegs rnams mchod par bya //
translated: and making offerings to those gone to the three times.

original: mchod cing de rnams mdun du ni //
analyzed: mchod cing de rnams mdun du ni //
translated: Having made offerings, in front of them,

original: lus sogs las skyes sdig pa rnams //
analyzed: lus sogs las skyes sdig pa rnams //
translated: the misdeeds arisen from body and so forth,

original: bgyid stsal dbye bas yang dag skyes //
analyzed: bgyid stsal dbye bas yang dag skyes //
translated: The perfect arising is from the division of the performance.

original: man ngag rig pas thams cad bshags //
analyzed: man ngag rig pas thams cad bshags //
translated: All are confessed by one who knows the esoteric instructions.

original: de la byung ba rnam par sbyang //
analyzed: de la byung ba rnam par sbyang //
translated: Therein, the arisen is purified.

original: dge ba kun la rjes yi rang //
analyzed: dge ba kun la rjes yi rang //
translated: One rejoices in all that is virtuous.

original: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song nas //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song nas //
translated: Having gone for refuge to the Three Jewels,

original: spros pa dang bcas rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: spros pa dang bcas rim pa bzhin //
translated: one should practice in stages with elaboration.

original: man ngag gis ni brtan byas nas //
analyzed: man ngag gis ni brtan byas nas //
translated: Having stabilized with the esoteric instructions,

original: ji srid byang chub bar du bsgrub //
analyzed: ji srid byang chub bar du bsgrub //
translated: one should practice until enlightenment.🔽One should meditate on the nature of the mind of enlightenment,

original: brtse bas sems can rnams la dmigs //🔽byang chub sems nyid bsgom par bya //
analyzed: brtse bas sems can rnams la dmigs // byang chub sems nyid bsgom par bya //
translated: which is focused on sentient beings with love.

original: mtshan med dmigs pa med pa yi //
analyzed: mtshan med dmigs pa med pa yi //
translated: It is signless and without reference,

original: rang bzhin med pa mkha' dbyings bzhin //🔽de la aa yig las byung ba'i //🔽chu skyes la gnas zla dkyil la ;
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa mkha' dbyings bzhin // de la aa yig las byung ba'i // chu skyes la gnas zla dkyil la ;
translated: without intrinsic nature, like the realm of space.🔽There, the goddess arisen from the seed syllable

original: / sa bon las byung lha mo ni //
analyzed: / sa bon las byung lha mo ni //
translated: is on a moon disk in a lotus,

original: zhal gsum so sor spyan gsum pa //
analyzed: zhal gsum so sor spyan gsum pa //
translated: with three faces and three eyes each,

original: lang tsho gzhon zhing phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: lang tsho gzhon zhing phun sum tshogs //
translated: youthful, and endowed with all perfections,

original: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
analyzed: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
translated: with the expressions of flirtatiousness and so on,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gang //
translated: and with all the qualities of all buddhas.

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: She is adorned with all ornaments.

original: 'od zer dang ldan na bza' ni //
analyzed: 'od zer dang ldan na bza' ni //
translated: He is clothed in a garment with light,

original: ston ka'i zla ba dang mtshungs pa //
analyzed: ston ka'i zla ba dang mtshungs pa //
translated: like the autumn moon.

original: rje bu n'a da'i gser mdog can //
analyzed: rje bu n'a da'i gser mdog can //
translated: The son of the lord is golden-colored,

original: g-yas pa'i zhal ni zhi ba'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i zhal ni zhi ba'o //
translated: with a peaceful right face,

original: dus mtha'i me 'bar sprin bzhin 'phro //
analyzed: dus mtha'i me 'bar sprin bzhin 'phro //
translated: like a cloud spreading with the blazing fire at the end of time.

original: 'jigs shing mi bzad g-yon pa'i zhal //
analyzed: 'jigs shing mi bzad g-yon pa'i zhal //
translated: The left face is terrifying and unbearable,

original: phyag g-yas nyid kyi thugs kar ni //
analyzed: phyag g-yas nyid kyi thugs kar ni //
translated: with the right hand

original: sna tshogs rdo rje @228a * //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje @228a * //
translated: holding a vajra cross

original: yang dag bsnams //
analyzed: yang dag bsnams //
translated: at his heart.

original: gnyis pa chu skyes steng gnas pa'i //
analyzed: gnyis pa chu skyes steng gnas pa'i //
translated: The second holds a lotus,

original: sangs rgyas dang ni gsum par mda' //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang ni gsum par mda' //
translated: the third a bow,

original: mchog sbyin phyag rgya bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: mchog sbyin phyag rgya bzhi pa'o //
translated: and the fourth the boon-granting mudrā.

original: g-yon na go rims ji bzhin du //
analyzed: g-yon na go rims ji bzhin du //
translated: The left hands hold, in order,🔽a lasso with a threatening gesture,

original: sdigs mdzub dang bcas zhags pa dang // gzhu dang de bzhin mi 'jigs pa //🔽bum pa gang ba bsnams pa ni //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub dang bcas zhags pa dang // gzhu dang de bzhin mi 'jigs pa // bum pa gang ba bsnams pa ni //
translated: a bow, and likewise the gesture of fearlessness.🔽One should meditate on him as residing in a stūpa,

original: mchod rten nang bzhugs bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mchod rten nang bzhugs bsgom par bya //
translated: holding a full vase.

original: snying gar sa bon dang bcas pa'i //
analyzed: snying gar sa bon dang bcas pa'i //
translated: At the heart, together with the seed syllable,

original: padma bsam bya de steng du //
analyzed: padma bsam bya de steng du //
translated: one should visualize a lotus,

original: 'od zer dkar po'i dra ba yis //
analyzed: 'od zer dkar po'i dra ba yis //
translated: on top of which is a web of white light rays.

original: bsbul  zhing gdan drangs nam mkha' la //
analyzed: bsbul  zhing gdan drangs nam mkha' la //
translated: and invited into the sky,🔽the great cloud-mass of Buddhas

original: sangs rgyas sprin tshogs chen po dang // byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag 'khod ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin tshogs chen po dang // byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag 'khod ;
translated: and all the Bodhisattvas are seated.

original: / brtse chen bdag nyid de rnams kyang //
analyzed: / brtse chen bdag nyid de rnams kyang //
translated: Those who are the very essence of great compassion

original: rang rgyud dus gsum 'khor bar bsam //
analyzed: rang rgyud dus gsum 'khor bar bsam //
translated: are thought of as revolving in the three times of one's own continuum.

original: dbang bskur rab tu sbyin par mdzad //
analyzed: dbang bskur rab tu sbyin par mdzad //
translated: They bestow the consecration and the gift.

original: 'bad pas rtag tu bsam par bya //🔽mchod rten nang bzhugs aom dang tr'am //
analyzed: 'bad pas rtag tu bsam par bya // mchod rten nang bzhugs aom dang tr'am //
translated: One should always think of them with effort.🔽The syllable Om and the syllable Tram

original: a'a:yig 'od zer rab tu 'phro //
analyzed: a'a:yig 'od zer rab tu 'phro //
translated: are in the center of the stupa, radiating light.

original: h'um hr'i:aam a'a:zhes pa yi //
analyzed: h'um hr'i:aam a'a:zhes pa yi //
translated: The seed syllables Hum, Hrih, Om, and Tram

original: sa bon las skyes go rim pa bzhin //🔽spyi bo dpral ba mgrin pa'i gnas //🔽snying ga lte ba rkang pa'i gnas //
analyzed: sa bon las skyes go rim pa bzhin // spyi bo dpral ba mgrin pa'i gnas // snying ga lte ba rkang pa'i gnas //
translated: are born in order,🔽at the places of the crown of the head, the forehead, the throat,

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
translated: the heart, the navel, and the feet.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug rnal 'byor bsam //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug rnal 'byor bsam //
translated: One should think of the yoga of Lokesvara

original: ston ka'i zla 'od dang mtshungs pa //
analyzed: ston ka'i zla 'od dang mtshungs pa //
translated: in the center of a moon mandala.🔽He is like the autumn moon,

original: 'od zer ngag gi phreng ba 'phro //
analyzed: 'od zer ngag gi phreng ba 'phro //
translated: radiating a garland of light rays.

original: chu skyes rdo rje dag las byung ;
analyzed: chu skyes rdo rje dag las byung ;
translated: He is born from a lotus and a vajra,

original: / g-yas pa dag gis rnga yab bsnams //
analyzed: / g-yas pa dag gis rnga yab bsnams //
translated: and in his right hand he holds a yak-tail fan.

original: padma rdo rje 'dzin pa dag / de yi g-yas g-yon logs su'o //
analyzed: padma rdo rje 'dzin pa dag / de yi g-yas g-yon logs su'o //
translated: Padma and Vajradhara, on his right and left.

original: mdun du mi g-yo ba dang ni //
analyzed: mdun du mi g-yo ba dang ni //
translated: In front of him, Acala,🔽and on the right,

original: 'dod pa'i rgyal po g-yas phyogs su //🔽rgyab kyi phyogs su dbyug sngon can //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyal po g-yas phyogs su // rgyab kyi phyogs su dbyug sngon can //
translated: the King of Passion,

original: g-yon du stobs chen dgod par bya //🔽ral gri lcags kyu dbyug pa dang ; / rdo rje rnams ni phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: g-yon du stobs chen dgod par bya // ral gri lcags kyu dbyug pa dang ; / rdo rje rnams ni phyag na bsnams //
translated: and on the left, Mahabala.🔽They hold swords, hooks, clubs, and vajras,

original: glog bcas rdo rje ltung bzhin pa'i //
analyzed: glog bcas rdo rje ltung bzhin pa'i //
translated: like lightning bolts falling with the vajra,

original: dus mtha'i chu 'dzin dang mtshungs pa //
analyzed: dus mtha'i chu 'dzin dang mtshungs pa //
translated: like clouds at the end of time,

original: spyan ni sos ka'i nyi 'od bzhin //
analyzed: spyan ni sos ka'i nyi 'od bzhin //
translated: with eyes like the spring sun,

original: gdug pa rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed //
analyzed: gdug pa rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed //
translated: robbing the life of the wicked.

original: kun gyi phyag g-yon rnams na ni //
analyzed: kun gyi phyag g-yon rnams na ni //
translated: In the left hands of all

original: sdigs mdzub dang bcas zhags pa bsnams //🔽'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub dang bcas zhags pa bsnams // 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs //
translated: are threatening forefingers and lassos.🔽They are surrounded by garlands of blazing light

original: sna tshogs padma nyi dkyil bzhugs //🔽sngags pas nyin dang mtshan mo ru //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma nyi dkyil bzhugs // sngags pas nyin dang mtshan mo ru //
translated: and stand on variegated lotus and sun seats.🔽The mantrin, endowed with yoga,

original: rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di yis bsgom //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di yis bsgom //
translated: should meditate on this day and night.

original: rdo rje'i theg par rab zhugs nas //
analyzed: rdo rje'i theg par rab zhugs nas //
translated: Having entered the Vajra Vehicle,

original: de yis myur du byang chub 'thob //
analyzed: de yis myur du byang chub 'thob //
translated: One will quickly attain enlightenment.

original: ces pa ni gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: ces pa ni gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the sādhana of Uṣṇīṣavijayā.
